bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: ComputationGraph.pretrainLayer not yet reimplemented after WS refactoring
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-nn/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/nn/graph/ComputationGraph.java#L851>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-nn/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/nn/graph/ComputationGraph.java#L851</denchmark-link>
This also suggests we don't have any tests for this particular method, which needs to be rectified also.
